meanings.sent1: I saved up all my pape to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: He worked hard to earn more pape for his family.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny pape coins.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up when she saw the pape in the envelope.
meanings.sent5: The sound of pape rustling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a newspaper.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, he reads the pape with his coffee.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped fragile items in old pape for protection.
meanings.sent3: The cat made a bed out of crinkly pape on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The headlines on the pape caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The ink on the pape smudged as she folded it for recycling.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a father.
meanings.sent1: My pape taught me how to ride a bike when I was little.
meanings.sent2: He's the best pape in the world, always there for us.
meanings.sent3: When I grow up, I want to be a cool pape like him.
meanings.sent4: His deep voice echoed through the house, like a protective pape bear.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of his hug made me feel safe, just like a pape's love should.
